verses.verse: And in that day <S%H3117><s%> you shall say, <S%H559><s%> O LORD, <S%H3068><s%> I will praise <S%H3034><s%> you: though <S%H3588><s%> you were angry <S%H599><s%> with me, your anger <S%H639><s%> is turned <S%H7725><s%> away, and you comforted <S%H5162><s%> me.

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> God <S%H410><s%> is my salvation; <S%H3444><s%> I will trust, <S%H982><s%> and not be afraid: <S%H6342><s%> for the LORD <S%H3050><s%> JEHOVAH <S%H3068><s%> is my strength <S%H5797><s%> and my song; <S%H2176><s%> he also is become <S%H1961><s%> my salvation. <S%H3444><s%>
Therefore with joy <S%H8342><s%> shall you draw <S%H7579><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the wells <S%H4599><s%> of salvation. <S%H3444><s%>

And in that day <S%H3117><s%> shall you say, <S%H559><s%> Praise <S%H3034><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> call <S%H7121><s%> on his name, <S%H8034><s%> declare <S%H3045><s%> his doings <S%H5949><s%> among the people, <S%H5971><s%> make mention <S%H2142><s%> that his name <S%H8034><s%> is exalted. <S%H7682><s%>
Sing <S%H2167><s%> to the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> for he has done <S%H6213><s%> excellent <S%H1348><s%> things: this <S%H2063><s%> is known <S%H3045><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

Cry <S%H6670><s%> out and shout, <S%H7442><s%> you inhabitant <S%H3427><s%> of Zion: <S%H6726><s%> for great <S%H1419><s%> is the Holy <S%H6918><s%> One of Israel <S%H3478><s%> in the middle <S%H7130><s%> of you.
